title: Asking GD'ers that read for pleasure, can you give me some recommendations?
body: The last book I read (or tried to read) was Blood Meridian by Cormac McCarthy. I just couldn't get into the story, and the lack of quotation marks was really off putting. I'm looking for something else to read, but would like some recommendations. I was thinking about getting The Martian because I watched the movie and wanted to see how it differed from the novel, but what do yo guys suggest?
